content.question: For a firm operating in perfectly competitive product and factor markets, the marginal revenue product of labor is equal to the

choices.label: price of labor multiplied by the marginal product of labor
price of labor multiplied by the price of the output
price of the output divided by the price of labor
price of the output multiplied by the marginal product of labor

content.answer: price of the output multiplied by the marginal product of labor

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
